riddles.riddle: What phrase is said when one of us is frustrated?
riddles.description: Ah yes, "Strong deeds, gentle words."... perfect for a state motto, or when you've been slighted.

riddles.riddle: What did Chelsea mistakenly misname for years in Nebraska until she was corrected in Utah?
What is our one, only true regret from our entire marriage?
What activity helped us realize that we are two different people who just do things differently, and that is okay?
riddles.description: For the record, the right way is water first, then toothpaste.

riddles.riddle: What activity helped us realize that I must be cold-blooded?
riddles.description: I think I mostly tend to like warmer showers than you now.

riddles.riddle: What is another term we have used for attractive or appealing?
What nickname did I think would be awesome for a son?
riddles.description: Yeah, probably best to wait another generation or two before bringing that one into the mix.

riddles.riddle: What did we think was a bit odd that Kevin and Kristin Newman said they would never do?
riddles.description: I'm glad that what is mine is your and what's yours is mine.

riddles.riddle: Around age 2, what would Gideon say that we perfectly understood, but then again, never really did?
riddles.description: That might be the first thing I ask when I get to heaven.

riddles.riddle: What unappealing food were you glad to choose in the end?
riddles.description: Liverpostej is actually not so bad. Kind of like refried beans.

riddles.riddle: What band name were you surprised, perhaps appalled to learn of?
riddles.description: Never would have guessed that we both like moldy peaches.

riddles.riddle: What was initially perceived as a concern for disaster which quickly was an impressive feat, accomplished by Trevor?
riddles.description: Luckily, I learned that one from my Mother.

riddles.riddle: What was said as a jestful invitation to call calm any anxiousness towards endowment?

riddles.description: To find what you seek, look beyond the blanked word... Good luck and Happy Mother's Day!
